channel.title: Error connecting to server?
channel.description:
im using an edgepkers base and insidia x client, ive set my environment variables using EV setter, changed the ip on my client and setup utorrent to allow port 43594, checked on canyouseeme.org and it says it can see my service.
the only thing is that the cache downloader for the client is slightly broke so they have to put the cache in the c:/ themselves...
so whats wrong with it ? do i need to add something in my source or client to let other people connect ?

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“heatrn11, post:6, topic:429886”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=532569.msg3892781#msg3892781 date=1327031862]

im using an edgepkers base and insidia x client, ive set my environment variables using EV setter, changed the ip on my client and setup utorrent to allow port 43594, checked on canyouseeme.org and it says it can see my service.

the only thing is that the cache downloader for the client is slightly broke so they have to put the cache in the c:/ themselves…

so whats wrong with it ? do i need to add something in my source or client to let other people connect ?

don’t let the players put there cache in there C: that could be one of the worst thing you as a server owner/hoster could do -__-, it could change you from having 25 players… to 3 players

Jagex places their cache in the C drive. What’s wrong with that? I think you are referring to manual cache placement.
[/quote]
thats what I said… -__-[/quote]

Lol. What are you on about. Our points are completely different.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @im_here im here
item.description:
@im_here wrote:

hell ya ihave the same problem 562 loading 659…
and cache at c:\user\user

don’t let the players put there cache in there C: that could be one of the worst thing you as a server owner/hoster could do -__-, it could change you from having 25 players… to 3 players
[/quote]

he was reffering to it but im not bothered about that at the moment :l, if anyones got any ideas as to why my client feel dree to suggest them…

so whats wrong with it ? do i need to add something in my source or client to let other people connect ?

item.title: Error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @fatmess fatmess
item.description:
@fatmess wrote:

i know but its only temporary whilst i figure out why they cant connect… no point in adding a new cache downloader,etc if they cant even play…

still need help if anyones got any ideas or could take a look on teamviewer

Read full topic
